# WebKitPoint

**Class**

`WebKitPoint` objects represent a point in two-dimensional space used by CSS transitions specified using the -webkit-transition property.

## Declaration

```swift
interface WebKitPoint
```

## Accessing Properties

- **x**: The x coordinate for the point.
- **y**: The y coordinate for the point.

items.description: The x coordinate for the point.
items.name: x

items.description: The y coordinate for the point.
items.name: y
